content.prompt: Someone who favored George Washingtonâ€™s approach to foreign policy would be most likely to object to which of the following United States policies?

choices.label: Declaration of neutrality at the beginning of the First World War

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
